channel.title: RetroBuzz Daily
channel.description: Snackable nostalgia: bite-sized 80s/90s listicles built for quick, satisfying scrolls.

item.title: 15 ’90s Toys You Forgot Existed (#7 Will Hit You Right in the Feels)
item.description: From Gooey alien eggs to the chaos of Pogs—how many do you remember?

item.title: 12 Fast-Food Items We Secretly Miss From the ’90s
item.description: The discontinued legends your taste buds still dream about.

item.title: 17 One-Hit Wonders from the ’90s You Still Know by Heart
item.description: Admit it—you’re humming at least three of these already.

item.title: 21 Tech Sounds from the ’90s That Live Rent-Free in Your Head
item.description: From dial-up screeches to ICQ’s little ‘uh‑oh.’

item.title: 13 School Supplies That Defined the ’90s Classroom
item.description: Lisa Frank rainbows, Trapper Keepers, and gel pens galore.
